abstract: Italian authorities recover fishing vessel that sank in Mediterranean Sea in April 2015, along with remains of at least 300 dead migrants who were trapped in hull; experts work to identify bodies in effort to provide closure for families; officials hope recovery will highlight tragic impact of human trafficking.
lead_paragraph: It is still unclear how many people died in the April 2015 shipwreck, which helped galvanize efforts to rescue people fleeing across the Mediterranean to Europe.

headline.main: Italian Navy Recovers Ship Containing at Least 300 Migrants’ Bodies
headline.print_headline: Italy Recovers Bodies of Hundreds of Migrants From ’15 Sinking

snippet: It is still unclear how many people died in the April 2015 shipwreck, which helped galvanize efforts to rescue people fleeing across the Mediterranean to Europe....
